CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Echo Trade relative to Silverleaf Emporium?
SRP.A: Echo Trade is {above} Silverleaf Emporium in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aether Market relative to Silverleaf Emporium?
SRP.A: Aether Market is {below} Silverleaf Emporium in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Silverleaf Emporium relative to Echo Trade?
SRP.A: Silverleaf Emporium is {below} Echo Trade in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total price index?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Echo Trade}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total price index?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Aether Market}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Aether Market's minimum Price Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Aether Market's minimum Price Index is in {2001}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Silverleaf Emporium's maximum Price Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Silverleaf Emporium's maximum Price Index is in {1986}.

NC.Q: Was the total Price Index in 1985 higher or lower than in 1989?
NC.A: The total price index in 1985 was {higher} than in 1989.

NC.Q: Between 1985 and 1989, was the average total Price Index higher or lower than between 1989 and 2007?
NC.A: The average total price index between 1985 and 1989 was {higher} than between 1989 and 2007.

NC.Q: Was the total Price Index in 1997 higher or lower than in 2010?
NC.A: The total price index in 1997 was {higher} than in 2010.

NC.Q: Was the total Price Index in 1987 higher or lower than in 2007?
NC.A: The total price index in 1987 was {higher} than in 2007.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Echo Trade} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Echo Trade and Silverleaf Emporium first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Echo Trade and Silverleaf Emporium first exchanged leading positions in {1986}.
